description:
Set young skiers up for success with these light skis that are easy to control and good for learning. The RC+ eSKIN Jr Classic Ski features skin grip technology that provides reliable kick and glide regardless of conditions. Mohair skin patches in the grip zone are as versatile as textured waxless bases, while providing more grip, better glide and a quieter ride.

  • Densolite 1000 shaped foam core with fiberglass wrap is light and responsive
  • S-cut, light carving sidecut behind the foot with a wider platform at the front for control and stability
  • Heel-Toe Camber provides easy kick and compression when pressing with the forefoot but remains lifted when pressing with the mid or rear of the foot
  • eSkinGrip+ waxless technology uses an integrated strip of skin underfoot so you don't need grip wax
  • Digital control of the moulding press allows optimal flex and camber for specific performance on snow
  • Precise stone grinding for easy glide in all snow conditions
  • Pre-mounted Prolink Access binding included
name: Salomon RC+ eSKIN Junior Skis + Prolink Access Bindings
